data.title: About: List of Jake and the Fatman episodes
data.meta_description: This article contains a list of episodes of the United States television series Jake and the Fatman, which were broadcast on CBS between 1987 and 1992.
data.text:
dbo:abstract

This article contains a list of episodes of the United States television series Jake and the Fatman, which were broadcast on CBS between 1987 and 1992. (en)

Poniżej znajduje się lista odcinków serialu Gliniarz i prokurator emitowanego przez CBS w latach 1987–1992. (pl)

dbp:shortsummary

Matlock continues to defend a mafia don , while Charlene blows her chance at a relationship with Paul when she is unable to separate the man from the legend. Guest Stars: Joe Penny, José Ferrer, Doran Clark, Mark La Mura, William Conrad, Alan Campbell, James McEachin, Ron Karabatsos, Joan Roberts, Sheree North, and Arthur Adams as Mr. Johnson (en)

Ben and Charlene take the controversial case of a Mafia don Nicholas Baron accused of murdering a business rival Donald Kovack ; Charlene is attracted to the man's son, Paul Baron . Other guest stars: Betty Lynn as Sarah , Johnny Silver as Eddie Alonzo, Joe Penny as Paul Baron, José Ferrer as Nicholas Baron, Doran Clark as Cathy Baron, Mark La Mura as Dr. Daniel Baron, William Conrad as D.A. James L. McShane , Alan Campbell as Palmer , James McEachin as Lt. Frank Daniels, Joseph Hacker as Phillip Kovack, Claude Earl Jones as Mr. Henderson, Ron Karabatsos as Dave Christopher, Sheree North as Alice Jenkins, Dominic Oliver as Roy Vincient, Joan Roberts as Mrs. Kovack, Tom McCleister as a Metro Cop, Lucille Meredith as Judge Irene Sawyer (en)
